strings.Value: "Octavia, what do you think you're doing?!"
[Pull away] "Octavia, don't. I value our friendship. Let's not ruin it."
[Hold Octavia in return, putting your hand on her breast]
"I would prefer to spend the night alone with Octavia."
[Leave with Octavia]
"Octavia, what are you... People are looking..."
{n}Returning from a campaign, you, Octavia, and Regongar enter the tavern to relax.{/n}

"...And that idiot hid the lockpicks in the most clever way he could think of: on a wall, under some barbed wire charmed with a lightning spell! So I've wrapped my pants around my hand to avoid getting fried — I had nothing else! I climb up on the barrel and start groping along the top of the wall, praying to {g|Calistria}Calistria{/g} that the guards don't show up. Imagine how that would look — pants off, perched up on a barrel!"
{n}Octavia laughs joyously.{/n} "Oh, Reg... It's so funny when you tell it. But we almost got killed that time!"
"But we didn't! We survived. We got out of there — so why not laugh now, huh?"
"Hahaha, exactly! You're so sweet! You are... both sweet!" {n}Octavia hugs both of you. You feel her hand slowly crawling from your shoulder down to your chest.{/n}
"Ha ha hmmm! It's getting hot in here! I think you'd better get a room..."
{n}The half-elf pulls her hand away.{/n} "What? I'm not doing anything! So, Reg, what happened next?"
"What about you, Reg? Let's all go together!"
"Why not! {Name}, what do you say?"
"No, no, you birdies have fun without me! I have a date with a barrel of beer today, and it's just getting started!"
{n}Octavia frowns in disappointment, but then quickly smiles at you.{/n} "Ok, whatever you like! So, Reg, tell the rest!"

{n}The half-orc sips from the mug.{/n} "So, where was I? Ah, right! I'm standing on the barrel, pants off, groping along the wall, searching for that freaking lockpick. And then I realize the barrel is rotten, and it's cracking right under my feet..."
"Haha! Have fun!"
"Ha ha hmm... That's true! Let's go!"
"As you wish..." {n}Octavia hugs you and pulls you towards the door softly but insistently.{/n}
"So? Let them watch!" {n}Octavia moves closer to you, and her hand slides down onto your thigh.{/n}
